about_the_game:
Welcome to Whisper Town! We’re looking for an experienced “Home Service Worker” to help our residents with moving and organizing their homes.

This is a unique town and you might work with treefolk, fishfolk... But don’t worry; the tasks aren’t too complex. We hope you enjoy your time here.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Moving in Services: Assist clients with moving into their new homes, from arranging small, delicate items to placing uniquely shaped furniture.

  • Household Organization: Take charge of tidying, organizing, and cleaning tasks to ensure each client’s home is neat and comfortable.

  • Personalized Decorating: Fulfill special arrangement requests to create spaces that reflect each client’s unique personality. Bold, creative room designs might even inspire new ideas for your own work!

Benefits:

  • Generous Salary: Your hard work will be generously rewarded.

  • Customizable Living Space: Use the resources you gather on the job to create your own personal living space, crafting a warm and cozy home for yourself.

  • New Work Environment: In your free time, you can explore the town at your leisure, visit new areas, and perhaps discover unexpected surprises waiting for you.

Job Requirements:

  • Experience in housekeeping services, detail-oriented, and physically capable. Familiar with tasks such as moving, organizing, storing, and cleaning, and able to handle various items and detailed arrangements.

  • Strong object-handling skills, able to easily pick up and place furniture and items.

  • Responsible and respectful of client privacy, with a strong sense of confidentiality and an awareness to avoid unintentionally prying into clients' personal matters.

  • A personal understanding of home decor aesthetics, with the ability to fully consider user needs and create a living environment that satisfies clients.

short_description: Whisper of the House is a cozy game about organizing and decorating. You'll take on various requests from the townspeople—helping them move, organize, and clean their spaces. In the process, your gentle touch might make a difference in their lives, and perhaps uncover some hidden stories...
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
